Articles.Content:
Hello, all. Saw this game featured on Rock, Paper, Shotgun and knew I\'d love it.

After some disastrous but entertaining dicking around to start, I finally watched a YouTube video about achieving orbit and while I haven\'t achieved it yet, I\'m almost there.

I feel like it might be easier if I knew what the symbols on the Navball mean (it\'s a shame that there doesn\'t seem to be an article on the Navball in the wiki). Could anybody give me a rundown of what the symbols that appear on the Navball are (such as the yellow circle thing) and how the might be useful in attaining orbit?

Thanks

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

The yellow markers indicate forward direction of travel and it\'s opposite. The purple markers indicate towards the launch pad and away from the launchpad.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
